dcterms:description: HYPO is an annotated dataset containing hyperbolic utterances and their literal paraphrases. It consists of three corpora: Hyperbole Corpus, Minimal Units Corpus, and Paraphrase Corpus, totaling over 2,100 sentences. The dataset is used for hyperbole detection tasks.
dcterms:title: HYPO Dataset
